coreAttributes.name: Peace-Maker
coreAttributes.description: A streamlined driveblade that has incredible potential to be modified manually. Its an enhanced version of the original default imperial blade, so it still lacks most elemental capability with a tradeoff for physical damage output. Its widely used by the imperial royal guard for its reliability.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Load a cartridge into the peacemaker and cleave into [npc2.Name] with it.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fasten)] the Peace-Maker to [npc.her] back, With the cartridge in,safety on, with its gears locked for later use.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the Peace-Maker from [npc.her] back, [npc.verb(unload)] it's active cartridge and [npc.verb(store)] it for later.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(prime)] [npc.her] blade before slicing [npc2.name], the sword passing through [npc2.her] body while expelling its element and heating to its bright molten orange phase. The heavy whiriling of the gears slow to a hum before the cartridge unlocks.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(cleave)] [npc.her] blade through [npc2.Name]'s chest causing the Peace-Maker to expel its elemental charge before the blade heats to a molten orange. The blade's gears slow to a soft hum before the cartridge unlocks.

With an swift step forwards,[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] the blade through [npc2.name] piercing [npc2.her] diffusing the blade's elemental charge. As the blade finishes its initial burst it flairs into its usual molten orange. The blade's gears slow to a dull whir before its cartridge unlocks.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(prime)] [npc.her] blade before slicing at [npc2.name], The blade discharges early turning the blade molten orange before missing completely. The gears whir to almost a stop before the cartridge unlocks.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(cleave)] [npc.her] blade at [npc2.Name], but [npc.verb(miss)] [npc2.her] narrowly, not long after the blade super heats and the cartridge unlocks.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] sword at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(lose)] [npc.her] balance, [npc.her] strike falling well short of [npc.her] target, [Npc2.name]. The blade glows into a molten orange before slowing its hum and unlocking its cartridge.
